name: Wellsprings
description: Wellsprings is one of the sub-districts of Heywood, located in central Night City. During the 2070s, Heywood was considered a district of contrasts, and none exemplified this more than Wellsprings, a sub-district occupying Heywood's western neighborhoods.[1] This was a relatively safe area, at least on the sides bordering with City Center. Buildings in the northern parts of the sub-district were newer and modern, erected late in the rebuilding of Night City during the 2060s. These...
